Articles.Content:
I made a craft using the Airstream Protective Shield, also known as Stock Fairings.

Crashing said craft stops gravity from happening, as well as loss of command over the pod.

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/MJXJNTjA06c?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

[Link to craft](https://www.dropbox.com/s/89j21kz9tvi2fa6/fairing%20shield.craft?dl=0)

It might have something to do with the fact that I somehow managed to crash every part of this ship but the command pod.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-02T04:14:25Z" title="05/02/2015 04:14  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 2, 2015</time> by Tery215**
